message.body: Quick question: (I just knocked on your door, but there was no answer.) If someone in your room is listening to music with a subwoofer, could you ask the
m to turn it down. It's vibrating throw the walls and is really loud in my room. Thanks.

Sorry I was in my bedroom. I don't know what a subwoofer is, but I turned down the bass on my computer. Although if you had any idea how loud people are in our common room at 1 and 2 almost every night, this would seem like nothing. Thank God this year is almost over.
Thank you so much. I'm sorry they are so loud. If you would like I could send out a reminder about being quite during reading period. Let me know. Hope t
No, it's fine, don't worry about it. It's my 8:30 everyday class that's the problem not them
